title: Evidence shows the Clean Air Act has reduced racial disparities in exposure to pollution
author: Laura Counts
excerpt:
Air pollution has disproportionately hurt minority and low-income communities, leading to reduced life expectancy, research has found. Yet a lack of data has stymied efforts to quantify the problem—and its causes—nationwide.
